message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $75?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $82. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from this product. What do you think?
